Package renderer

Class Render

java.lang.Object
renderer.Render
public class Render
extends java.lang.Object
class Render, responsible to take all the calculation of ray intersections and light, and to create a picture from that.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private ImageWriter imageWriter  
    private Scene scene
    scene - stores all the scene components imageWriter - save the picture and project path and the pixels matrix

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Render​(ImageWriter imageWriter, Scene scene)
    constructor to initialized class Render

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint intersection)
    function to calculate the color for the closes point to the ray
    private Color calcDiffusive​(double kd, Vector l, Vector n, Color lightIntensity)
    function to calculate the diffusive
    private Color calcSpecular​(double ks, Vector l, Vector n, Vector v, int nShininess, Color lightIntensity)
    function to calculate the specular
    private Intersectable.GeoPoint getClosesPoint​(java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> intersectionsPoints)
    function receive some points, and return the point with the minimal distance from the ray
    void printGrid​(int interval, java.awt.Color color)
    function to print grid into the scene, to make sure everything is in the right place
    void renderImage()
    this function responsible for fill up the pixels matrix from the scene, it receive from the scene the colors for each pixel and fill the matrix in the image writer
    void writeToImage()
    write the details of the scene, by calling the function from Image Writer class

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      Returns:
